com.martinandersson.javaee.utils

Class DeploymentBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.martinandersson.javaee.utils.DeploymentBuilder

  • public class DeploymentBuilder
extends Object
    Builder of deployable archives.

    Currently, the only outcome of this builder is a WebArchive (.war).

    The builder is not reusable. build() crash if called twice.

    Author:
    Martin Andersson (webmaster at martinandersson.com)

    • Constructor Detail

      • DeploymentBuilder

        public DeploymentBuilder(Class<?> testClass)
        Initializes a new deployment builder.

        The archive's name will become the simple name of the specified test class.

        Parameters:
        testClass - test class using this builder

      • DeploymentBuilder

        public DeploymentBuilder(Class<?> testClass,
                         String warFileNameSuffix)
        Initializes a new deployment builder.

        The archive's name will become the simple name of the specified test class.

        An optional prefix can be added to the file name. This feature is usable for tests that use multiple deployments (otherwise Arquillian will complain).

        Parameters:
        testClass - test class using this builder
        warFileNameSuffix - suffix to be appended to the file name (may be null or the empty string)

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public DeploymentBuilder add(Class<?> first,
                             Class<?>... more)
        Add the specified types to the archive.
        Parameters:
        first - any type
        more - more types
        Returns:
        this builder

      • add

        public DeploymentBuilder add(Package first,
                             Package... more)
        Add all types discovered in the specified package to the archive.
        Parameters:
        first - a Java package
        more - some more Java packages
        Returns:
        this builder

      • add

        public DeploymentBuilder add(boolean withPackageFriends,
                             Class<?> first,
                             Class<?>... more)
        Add the specified types to the archive.

        If withPackageFriends is true, then all types discovered to be collocated with the specified types are included as well.

        Parameters:
        withPackageFriends - include package friends or not
        first - any Java type
        more - some more Java types
        Returns:
        this builder

      • addTestPackage

        public DeploymentBuilder addTestPackage()
        Add all types discovered in the same package as the test class using this builder.
        Returns:
        this builder

      • addPackageOf

        public DeploymentBuilder addPackageOf(Class<?> type)
        Add all types discovered in the same package as the specified type.
        Parameters:
        type - any types
        Returns:
        this builder

      • addEmptyBeansXMLFile

        public DeploymentBuilder addEmptyBeansXMLFile()
        Will add an empty beans.xml to the archive.

        The built archive is considered an "explicit bean archive" meaning that all classes will be eligible for lookup.

        Returns:
        this builder
        See Also:
        com.martinandersson.javaee.cdi.packaging

      • addPersistenceXMLFile

        public DeploymentBuilder addPersistenceXMLFile(SchemaGenerationStrategy strategy)
        Will add a persistence.xml file and a Java DB driver to the archive.

        The Java DB driver is only necessary for WildFly, not GlassFish. GlassFish already has a Java DB driver, WildFly don't.

        Parameters:
        strategy - which strategy to use
        Returns:
        this builder

      • build

        public org.jboss.shrinkwrap.api.spec.WebArchive build()
        Build an archive using types and settings as provided earlier to the builder.
        Returns:
        a web archive
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if deployment has already been built
